message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The patient shows signs of emotional dysregulation, impulsivity, self-harm, and unstable relationships, which are indicative of borderline personality disorder. Histrionic personality disorder is characterized by attention-seeking behavior, but not necessarily self-harm. Avoidant personality disorder is characterized by social inhibition and fear of rejection, while dependent personality disorder is characterized by a need to be taken care of and fear of separation.
